attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reduce the price of Diesel automotive fuel as it is less harmfull than Petrol yet the pumps charge more. The new diesel cars offer an ever greater reduction of emmisions than their petrol counterparts. The United Kingdom pays more than any other country for fuel. Tony Blair needs to get a grip and realise that the UK is not fighting Global Warming on its own...theres the clue " GLOBAL" so lets get a grip on reality and run in line with American fuel prices.

rejection.details: The title of a petition ought to be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
